title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum.

Identification (1 point)

Z* W

Description (1 point)

• Fewer offspring will develop/survive.

• 1/4 of the offspring are predicted to die.

• Some of her offspring will have the Z* chromosome/all of her male offspring will have a Z* chromosome.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

2 points maximum.

Identification (1 point)

Z* W

Description (1 point)

• Fewer offspring will develop/survive.

• 1/4 of the offspring are predicted to die.

• Some of her offspring will have the Z* chromosome/all of her male offspring will have a Z* chromosome.

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 points maximum.

Z* W

Description (1 point)

• Fewer offspring will develop/survive.

• 1/4 of the offspring are predicted to die.

• Some of her offspring will have the Z* chromosome/all of her male offspring will have a Z* chromosome.

The student response earns two of the following points:

2 points maximum.

Z* W

Description (1 point)

• 1/4 of the offspring are predicted to die.

• Some of her offspring will have the Z* chromosome/all of her male offspring will have a Z* chromosome.
